text: Capitán Sarmiento is a town in Buenos Aires Province, Argentina. It is the head town of the Capitán Sarmiento Partido. ==History== The town and Partido were created on December 21 1961. It was named after Domingo Fidel Sarmiento, son of former President Domingo Faustino Sarmiento. Category:Towns in Argentina Category:1961 establishments in South America Category:1960s establishments in Argentina
title: Capitán Sarmiento, Buenos Aires
